message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents fair value, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you meet me halfway at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
